transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Hello, and how do, folks. This is Tansut, fearless space criminal, welcoming you to "Space Ghost Coast to Coast". I'm not allowed to say who the guests are tonight, because two villains, whose name I won't mention but they're on this show, said they would hit me in the face if I told anybody. (crying) I don't know what the point of being an announcer is, if I can't announce something. (sobbing) I hate this job!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in) Greetings! I'm Space Ghost! On tonight's show, we have Ohio state senator Howard Metzenbaum, and America's most loveable drunk, Foster Brooks.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (wearing a cap) Ready when you are.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, what's that on your head?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: A cap.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh huh. And, does that say "Sci-Fi Con '97"?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Y'know, I believe it does.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And when was this 'quote' 'unquote' "Sci-Fi Con '97"?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, uh, last weekend.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares in silence)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: And, all last week.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Here? On Ghost Planet? Why wasn't I invited?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: We only invite guests of honor, everyone else is $4.50 a day, or twelve bucks for the weekend.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Really!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well then, who was your "guest of honor"?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Bill Mumy.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: He signed my helmet.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bill Mumy? You honored Bill Mumy? What did the fa-a-amous Bill Mumy do to get invited.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, only "Babylon 5"...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: "Lost in Space"...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: "Twilight Zone"...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: "Space Cases"...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, and he was the only one to play the child version of Darin Stevens on "Bewitched". (monitor shows Zorak, with text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos to desk while they talk)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: "Bewitched" isn't sci-fi.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's got witches.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh yeah, magic. I'll give you that one.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Duh!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, okay, okay! I can't believe this! I sit here with you guys week after week, and here you go behind my back and invite Mumy!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, he's your first guest. (monitor shows Space Ghost at his desk, with text:)

transcript.speaker: CAM 463DISTANCE TO NEXTREST STOP
transcript.dialogue: 50 MILES

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Eh, my first guest? Where's Metzenbaum?!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, he's been... detained.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: "Detained"?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: On the planet Rumyungyunson... son.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: There is no planet Rumyungyunsonson.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well... that's where he is.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Don't look at me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You didn't even book Howard Metzenbaum, did you?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (silence)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Did you!?!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Here's Bill.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't do it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: C'mon, he came a long way.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (starts blasting his monitor screen continuously)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm just gonna keep on blasting the screen until ya get rid of him.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (to Bill) Uh, can't let ya out there just yet, Bill. We're, uh, havin' some technical problems. (monitor shows mirror image text:)

transcript.speaker: Bill Mumy
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, sir. (monitor shows mirror image text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (tries to fire power bands, but no blast) Aw nuts. Ran outta juice.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Now, Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Now! (throws lever, sending Bill to the studio monitor)

transcript.speaker: Bill Mumy
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! Pleasure to be with you here, sir. Zorak, you're lookin' good.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Thanks, Bill.

transcript.speaker: Bill Mumy
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, how ya doin', man?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Eh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He can sit there, but I won't talk to him. (hums in background and doodles)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (to Bill) You have a good time at Sci-Fi Con?

transcript.speaker: Bill Mumy
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, absolutely.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Man, the costume show was awesome!

transcript.speaker: Bill Mumy
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (humming and singing quitely) I'm not listening to you...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It was a great time had by all... except for Space Ghost. (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Bill Mumy
transcript.dialogue: Yup, yeah, it was a, it was a fun eight days, y'know...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (shouts) Look, I drew a piggy! (hold up picture)

transcript.speaker: Bill Mumy
transcript.dialogue: (nods)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ih, uh... So, Bill, tell us about the worst "Lost in Space" episode ever.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, like you told the panel at the convention. (monitor shows mirror image text:)

transcript.speaker: Bill Mumy
transcript.dialogue: Oh yeah. (Space Ghost gibbers & mocks him in the background) Well, this was called "The Great Vegetable Rebellion", and the Jupiter 2 had landed on a planet with sentient vegetables, and while we were collecting specimens for our galley, for dinner, we started this great rebellion, by this talking carrot, named Tybo. That's even more than I'd even hoped to remember.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (mocking) ... more than I ever hoped to remember. Blb blb blb... (makes raspberry sounds) Now, if you'll excuse me, boys, I've got to go. (flies off)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uh... So, Bill, uh, what was the name of that carrot again?

transcript.speaker: Bill Mumy
transcript.dialogue: Tybo. (screen zaps & goes black, except for fading white dot in the middle)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throwing levers) Uh, Bill? (monitor shows fading dot and text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (bounds back in to desk) There! That's done!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What did you just do?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I unplugged the feed. (sarcastically) That's okay, isn't it, Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You idiot! Why did you do that? Now I gotta go downstairs and reboot the entire system. (walks off) (monitor shows Space Ghost, with text:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Y'know, Zorak, I've been thinking of having my own convention. It'll be called (begin echo effect) "Space Ghost Con '97"! (end echo) And it won't involve you! Because I don't need you!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Pfff! Knock yourself out.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What're you wearing?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (wearing Klingon mask and armor, speaking in Klingon voice) I am Gowron, leader of the Klingon High Council! You have dishonored your family name, Worf, son of Mogh!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I said, I am Gowron, leader of the Klingon High Counc-

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Take off that stupid hat!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (pause) It's a mask.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I don't care what it is, it's not getting you into "Space Ghost Con '97".

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (sits there)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Take it off!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Um, Foster Brooks has, uh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Also been detained on the planet Rumyungyunsonson?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Yes. (Monitor shows famous e-mail addresses again)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And who do you propose that we replace him with?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well... Mark Hamill's here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The "Star Wars" guy?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Ahem! Correction! THE "Star Wars" guy!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He was here for your dumb convention, wasn't he?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, no no no no no no no, he was here for the... uh... the "Corvette Summer" convention.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, the "Corvette Summer" convention. At the, La Quinta.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, yeah, it's, uh, down the, um, street. (monitor shows text:)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, down the street.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Huh. Well, maybe he'll take part in, ahem, (begin echo effect) "Space Ghost Con '97"! (end echo)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Maybe he won't.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Yeah, maybe he's got other plans.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, what do you guys know?

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (appears on studio monitor) Uh, it's Mark Hamill here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whoa! Look who's here, young people! It's none other than Duke Fartknocker!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Luke Skywalker!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Luke Skytopper of the popular "Space War" science fiction mega-empire franchise.

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I think it's much more along the lines of a fairy tale than it is straightforward science fiction.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whatever, professor. How's Chewwy?

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: Chewwy? Well, you know...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) You and me both!

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (stares back)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: But seriously, Mark... (very quietly) was it scary working with Lord Vader?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (making Darth Vader breathing noises)

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: James Earl Jones is just such a gifted person, and-

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Prowse.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Eh?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: David Prowse. He played Vader in the movie version, not Jones.

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Hey, I said a dirty word.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you did, pal!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: David Prowse! Are you joking? If this is a joke, I'm not laughing.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Prowse is the true Lord Vader!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Prowse? Blpblpblp! He was a figurehead! It is Jones who is the true Vader!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Answer me this, Moltar: who patrolled the galleys of the Death Star?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: The ewoks!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Don't patronize me, bantha fodder!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, if you consulted your handbook, you would know it was the storm troopers.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yes, of course, but who led them, Moltar? Huh? Who led 'em? Refresh my memory on this one, if you please!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (silent)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Would that be Pr... Pr.. Pr.. Pro-w-w-w-w-wse?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Prowse, but he-

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Exactly!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: But-

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Exactly, Moltar! That's exactly what I thought!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, what do you fellas thing of those Ghostbusters?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares back)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You think they'd scare me because I'm, you know, I'm a ghost.

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (stares back)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I mean, hey, Zorak, who ya gonna call?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'm gonna call you an idiot.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You heard me! Mouth breather!

transcript.speaker: Voice
transcript.dialogue: Trust in your feelings, Tad. Use the powerbands!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blast Zorak with destructo ray; music ends)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (to Mark) Wouldn't be interested in a new career as a sidekick, would you?

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know, I, uh, it beats Ed McMahon.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I must warn you, you would be required to laugh at the outrageously hilarious antics of a talk show in outer space!

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (in Ed McMahon voice) Ho ho ho ho, yes! (normal voice) I can do that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I like your attitude, Hamill. Come in Monday for paperwork.

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (in Ed McMahon voice) Ho ho ho ho, yes!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Whoa, save some for the convention, buddy!

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (in Ed McMahon voice) Ho ho ho ho, yes!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares back)

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (clears his throat)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, what do you do at these conventions? Do you, say, show how you ate breakfast on Tattooine? Is it Tattooine?

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: Oh, me eating cereal would be (makes slurping sounds through his hands)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hmmm, impressive.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: This is just sad.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's amazing, Mark. Would you bring your imaginary bowl of cereal to my convention?

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: That'd be great, if I'm, um, in your galaxy, I'll stop on by.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Great! Then I'll see you at "Space Ghost Con '97".

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: Thank you so much for having me. (image fades from monitor)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I don't know, he sounded iffy.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's not the Luke Skytopper I know!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You don't know Luke Skywalker!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Can you ever really know a man, Zorak? (syrupy music swells in background) I mean, sure, you can know what he does, where he lives, the way his hair smells in the morning after a brief rain... (music stops) Wait a second! I've got to buy supplies for (begin echo effect) "Space Ghost Con '97"! (end echo) (flies off to office supply store, enters by crashing through ceiling) What a selection! You don't have to be a superhero to appreciate these super-savings!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (to Mark, on control room monitor) (impersonating James Earl Jones) "This is CNN."

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, and, uh, "Luke, I am your father."

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Did you get to sign my helmet yet? Uh, "son"?

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I signed it.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It was great having you at our "Sci-Fi Con", man.

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: Thanks so much.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: You're not, really going to "Space Ghost Con", are you?

transcript.speaker: Mark Hamill
transcript.dialogue: No, no, no, I was, I was workin' and I have another job after this, actually.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Good!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Greetings! The future of convention excitement awaits you at (begin echo effect) "Space Ghost Con '97"! (end echo)

transcript.speaker: Voice
transcript.dialogue: ("Star Wars" type music begins playing in background) Use the phone, Tad!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: The phone lines are open to order your tickets to "Space Ghost Con '97"! Featuring me, Space Ghost! Call 1-800-555- (echo) SG97 (end echo) ##839-174982 extension 49. (preceding numbers also subtitled on screen) Call now, the lines are open, and I'm standing by. (taps cards impatiently)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Lines are open. (taps cards some more)

transcript.speaker: Voice
transcript.dialogue: Tad, remind them about the free patch.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: First ten callers get a free patch.

transcript.speaker: Voice
transcript.dialogue: And did you mention the balloons for the kids?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Balloons for the kids. (taps cards) "Space Ghost Con '97"! Whole lotta fun!

transcript.speaker: Voice
transcript.dialogue: Tad, maybe mention the patch thing again.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I just did!
